[Jyhad:R2, VTES:R]
Cardtype: Political Action
Clan: Ventrue
Only usable if playing for ante.
Successful referendum means each Methuselah decides whether to ante the next card in his or her library or be ousted from the game. Decisions should be made simultaneously, as follows: each Methuselah holds out a hand with zero or one blood in it. Open hands simultaneously. A pool in a Methuselah's hand indicates that he or she chooses not to be ousted. Added to the V:EKN banned list in 1995.
Artist: Stuart Beel

Clan: Ahrimane

Any vampire can burn this location as a (D) action; titled vampires get +1 stealth on that action. Burn this card when it has no blood.

[SER] Put 1 corruption counter on the acting minion. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, you can burn them to steal him or her.

[qui] Maneuvers and presses cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood this round.

Name: Zoning Board
[CE:R2, KoT:R]
Cardtype: Master
Cost: 1 pool
Unique.
Put this card in play. During your master phase, you can choose a location controlled by another Methuselah. Until the end of your minion phase, any minion can shuffle that location in its owner's library as a (D) action. If that action is successful, that controller gains X pool, where X is the pool cost of the location. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action; in that referendum, you can tap this card to get +1 vote.
Artist: Steve Ellis

[Bl2017:U]
Cardtype: Reaction
Discipline: Necromancy & Auspex

[AUS][NEC] As above, but the acting minion must discard 3 cards at random to cancel this card as it is played.

[BL2017:U]
